company  there  shall  be  excluded  any  income  accruing 
in  or  derived  from  Malaysia  and  received  from  a  
takaful  operator  referred  to  in  subsection  109 e(2)

participant.”.

inward re-takaful business) shall be treated 
as  separate  general  businesses;

income  of  the  fund  established  in  respect  of  that 
business (in this section referred to as “family fund”)
